Title: Unite teams and tools with Miro and Microsoft | ODSP1444
Author: Microsoft Events
Description:
Sixty-two percent of knowledge workers globally say organizational silos are slowing innovation, with nearly half citing fragmented tooling as the cause. Discover how Miro's Microsoft integration suite connects content and insights across platforms in one unified workspace, empowering teams to accelerate decision-making and build the right thing, faster.
